backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor, data types, mission/files/notes structures, and storage plus authorization state with various counters and maps initialized.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking specific frontend components to feature requirements for folder and mission swipe‑to‑delete fixes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short descriptive summaries for many frontend files detailing their roles and behaviors.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation of creating a Draft baseline identical to Live v114 with verification steps and change‑control rules.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry defining meta tags, PWA settings, icons, and service worker registration.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Freeze notice prohibiting code changes after restoring Live v114 until explicit user approval.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, icons, and configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling precaching, caching strategy, and updates for the PWA.
frontend/PWA_INSTALLABILITY_NOTES.md: Checklist and guidance for verifying PWA installability on Chrome for Android including manifest, service worker, and icon requirements.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Restoration checklist confirming frontend parity with Live v114 across authentication, initialization, components, styling, and utilities.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the app in providers and renders HomePage with intro and upload queue behaviors.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component displaying error details and actions when actor initialization fails.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: Renders an animated target-style SVG icon with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: Empty file placeholder for a connectivity indicator component.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Renders a fixed bottom decorative line for UI styling.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog warning that a file couldn't open in a new window, offering retry and download actions.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Displays a file preview with actions like open, download, move, and delete, supporting multiple file types.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles file, link, and note uploads with concurrency control, speech-to-text, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that opens the folders view, with optional disabled and pulse states.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated folder management dialog enabling creation, rename, selection, and deletion of folders.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Full‑screen interface for browsing and managing folders with create, rename, and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing ©2025 attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full-screen viewer for navigating, sharing, deleting, and managing files with swipe gestures and fallback dialogs.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays files and notes in a gallery with selection, preview, bulk actions, and folder/mission operations.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with theme toggle, auth menu, and global progress bar.
frontend/src/components/HomeSharedElemen: Handles shared‑element transition animations between home UI sections using DOMRect measurements.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Splash intro screen showing an animated icon and fading out after 2 seconds.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog shown when a link fails to open, offering retry and copy‑link options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Internet Identity login button with loading state feedback.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full‑screen mission view for editing title, tasks, attached files/notes, and opening viewers with autosave support.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions with title input and task management before submitting to backend.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating mission launcher button with hover and pulse animations.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full-screen mission list with tabs, swipe actions, deletion, and detail navigation.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Wrapper component that restricts content to a mobile-only layout container.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for moving selected files or notes into an existing mission.
frontend/src/components/NoteViewerDialog: Viewer dialog for a note with actions to download, share, move, or delete it.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving files or notes to folders or returning them to the main collection.
Swipeable row component that reveals edit and delete actions, handling drag gestures and open state.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Displays a fixed progress bar summarizing active uploads with type counts and overall progress.
frontend/src/components/UploadQueueRunne: Restores and resumes persisted uploads with concurrency control and progress tracking when the backend actor becomes ready.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Intro screen with a stylized target graphic and onboarding text plus a login button.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Context managing backend actor initialization with retry logic, admin token handling, and error reporting.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Context tracking file, link, and note upload items with progress updates, completion cleanup, and item restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching an actor via react-query, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomePrefetch.ts: Prefetches folders, gallery files, missions, and notes once when the backend actor and identity are ready. Resets the prefetch flag on logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, and identity state management using AuthClient. Loads stored identities and exposes status flags for authentication flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntroOnAppResume.t: Runs a callback when the app regains focus or visibility, but only after identity initialization and authentication. Sets and cleans event listeners based on identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer via a media query and updates on changes. Returns true for touch devices.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionAutosave.ts: Debounces mission updates and autosaves changes using updateMutation, handling queued saves and mission switching. Tracks last saved state to avoid unnecessary updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Provides mission list, detail, create, and update hooks using react-query, with sorting, cache invalidation, and actor readiness checks. Handles mission mutations with optimistic updates and error logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: Defines hooks for listing, creating, and deleting notes across root, folder, and mission contexts using react-query. Uses a concurrency limiter and targeted cache invalidations based on note location.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating files and folders via a backend actor with concurrency limits and readiness checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Implements a speech-to-text hook using Web Speech API, handling interim/final results, errors, and microphone permissions.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and extensive light/dark theme CSS variables, including color systems and mobile layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function to merge and normalize class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component handling layout, authentication state, data prefetching, and lazy-loaded folder/mission views with UI transitions.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Contains standardized messages and utilities for classifying and handling backend actor initialization and connectivity errors.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Provides utilities for opening URLs, downloading files or notes, and sharing files via Web Share API with popup-block detection.
frontend/src/utils/fileBytesWorkerSingle: Manages a singleton worker for reading file bytes with concurrency control and queued requests.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Defines rules for determining how files should open based on MIME type, including viewer, office preview, or download behavior.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Classifies file MIME types into categories and provides labels and previewability checks.
frontend/src/utils/missionCompletion.ts: Calculates mission progress, checks completion, and splits missions into completed and incomplete groups.
frontend/src/utils/missionTaskCompare.ts: Compares arrays of tasks safely with BigInt IDs by checking IDs, text, and completion flags.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty file with no implemented functionality.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Implements optional performance timing utilities controlled by flags, with async operation timing helpers.
Persists upload queue items in IndexedDB with size limits, progress updates, and completion tracking.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Logs React Query mission mutation phases for debugging in development mode.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs development-only smoke tests for creating folders, missions, links, and notes via backend APIs and formats test results.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Provides concurrency limiters for async tasks, including a cancellable version with queue and stats.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/src/workers/fileBytes.worker.ts: Web worker that reads file bytes off the main thread and returns metadata or errors.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending colors, radius, animations, and enabling dark mode with plugins.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Lists all frontend files defining the v114 baseline for consistency and drift detection.
project_state.json: Describes project state, issues, and feature requests focused on fixing swipe-to-delete for folders and missions.
